assessment.howto1: How to use our Crime Preliminary Assessment!
assessment.howto2: Answer a few quick questions for us to narrow down on the specific crime and the recommended help

chatbot.errorMessage: I'm sorry, I'm not able to do that yet. If you want to try some other options please refresh the page.

seekHelp.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to help you.
seekHelp.hello2: You can ask me anything, pick a topic below or do the Crime Preliminary Assessment with me.

preliminary.text: Answer a few quick questions to narrow down on the specific crime and get tailored recommended help

crime.text: I don’t know what to do

seekHelp.crime: A crime has happened and I don't know what to do
seekHelp.crimeDoPreliminary: Would you like to do a Crime Preliminary Assessment where I will help you to narrow down on the specific crimes and recommend tailored help?
seekHelp.crime1-1: Every crime is worth reporting, no matter how severe it may seem at the moment.
seekHelp.crime1-2: Here’s a step-by-step guide on what you can do after experiencing a crime. Just click it to download.
seekHelp.crimeGuide: What To do After A Crime
seekHelp.crime3: Would you like some additional resources or do you just want to talk?
seekHelp.crime3Resources: Sure thing! What type of help do you need?
seekHelp.sexual1-1: If you have been sexually assaulted, it is important to remember that it was not your fault. Rape & sexual assault is always wrong - no matter who commits it or where it happens.
seekHelp.sexual1-2: I will be guiding you through a series of questions and steps on what you should do to seek the right type of help.
seekHelp.sexual2: These questions might be a little tough to get through, but I’m right here with you to get you the support you want.
seekHelp.sexual3: Did the crime take place recently (e.g. past 24 hours)?
seekHelp.sexual4: Was the perpetrator a stranger or somebody you recognise/know?
seekHelp.sexual6: Are you in a safe area now?
seekHelp.sexual7: Do you have anyone you can trust/lean on for support right now?
seekHelp.sexual8: Thank you for answering those questions, it must not have been easy but it is really brave of you.
seekHelp.sexual10: If you think none of these apply or if you just want to talk, I'll be here.

preliminary.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to guide you through this.
preliminary.hello2: There will be a series of questions where you can either pick an option or type your message in.
preliminary.hello3: At the end, there will be a list of all the possible crimes that may apply and you can export it and save it as a pdf.
preliminary.start: Were you harmed or did something get damaged/stolen?
preliminary.stolen1: Did the perpetrator hurt or threaten you?
preliminary.stolen2-2: Did the perpetrator have a weapon?
preliminary.damaged1: Were you hurt or did something get stolen?
preliminary.harmed2-1: Was there something damaged or stolen?
preliminary.harmed2-2: Were you also hurt in another way?
preliminary.harmed2-3: Was it in person or through the Internet?
preliminary.harmed3-1: Did the perpetrator use a weapon?
preliminary.harmed3-2: Did the perpetrator use a weapon?
preliminary.harmed3-3: Were you insulted, threatened or was your reputation damaged?

done.1: Thank you for your response. I have narrowed down a few possibilities that could be the crime.
done.2: Each result features tailored resources which you can access.
done.3: These results can also be exported into a PDF for your reference.
done.4: If there’s anything else, feel free to talk to me or explore our other resources.
done.5: Wishing you all the best, and stay safe!

resultNote.1: These results reference the German Criminal Code. For more details, please visit:

preliminary.retry: if you think none of these apply to you, you can try the assessment again or if you’re not sure what to do, talk to me so I can help you.

information.hello1: Hello, I’m Lilo! This is a safe and anonymous space and I’m here to help you.
information.hello2: You can ask me anything, pick a topic below or do the Crime Preliminary Assessment with me.

preliminary.text: Answer a few quick questions to narrow down on the specific crime and get tailored recommended help

information.forward: Alright, I'll forward you to an information page about that topic. If you need me again, I'll be here.

page1.hello: Hi I’m Lilo, your local law expert!

page2.header: For more accurate information, please provide your location and language

177.title: Section 177: Sexual assault; sexual coercion; rape

241.title: Section 241: Threatening commission of serious criminal offence

244-3.title: Section 244: Theft by burglary of dwellings
